item.description:
Looking for something to do Saturday night? Why not join NHC'er John for rollerderby with the Connecticut Roller Girls!

CTRG has decided to mix things up a bit -- instead of their local teams battling it out for another trophy, they'll use their entire league all season to create mixed team face-offs. They're starting it off this Saturday with Disco Vs. Punk. Who will win the right to dance off the track in victory? Only 60 minutes of grueling, action packed derby will decide.

Tickets are $10 in advance and $12 at the door. Kids under 12 free with adult admission.

Doors open at 6:00 pm, and the event starts at 7:00.

Now serving food and beer!

For more information, see the CT Roller Girls website at www.ctrollerderby.com

Your contact for this event, John, can be reached at 203-500-1039.
item.name: "Punk Vs. Disco" at the CT Rollerderby
